name: No-Knead Sun-dried Tomato Garlic Basil Bread
author: SPICYGIRL
summary: An easy tasty bread made with no kneading. Just beat with a wooden spoon. Eat warm out of the oven or enjoy toasted with butter or in a hearty sandwich.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon cornmeal, or more as needed
½ cup chopped dry-pack sun-dried tomatoes
directions: Combine 2 cups flour, yeast, salt, and sugar in a large bowl
Add warm water and olive oil; stir with a wooden spoon until well blended
Slowly mix in remaining 1 cup flour until dough holds together and isn't sticky
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until doubled in size, about 3 hours
Dust a baking sheet with cornmeal
Punch dough down and stir in sun-dried tomatoes, basil, and garlic using a wooden spoon or with your hands
Form dough into a loaf and place on the prepared baking sheet
Let dough rise in a warm area of the kitchen for 30 minutes
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bake in the preheated oven until loaf is golden brown, about 30 minutes
